name: Maruti Invicto
description: The price of Maruti Invicto, a 7 seater MUV, ranges from Rs. 25.05  - 28.72 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with an engine of 1987 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Invicto comes with 6 airbags. Maruti Invicto is available in 4 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 23.24 kmpl for Invicto.

variants.variant_name: Invicto Zeta Plus 7 STR 1987 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 23.24 kmpl, 150 bhp
